Class RTLValueBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zamia.rtl.RTLValueBuilder

  • public class RTLValueBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder class to construct complex (array/record typed), immutable RTLValue objects
    Author:
    Guenter Bartsch
